Anchor Themes – Themes built for Anchor, obviously

Anchored Gallery

Anchored Gallery is a theme for Anchor CMS developed by Alexander Stavrinou. It's a theme for photographers or designers or really anyone with pictures they want to show as the focal point of their blog.
